attributes.action: apologize for calling about half the adult population 'flat-earthers'.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have studied physics for 45 years and been a chartered engineer for 30 years. I have a good degree from the same college as Issac Newton. I, like Professor Lindzen of MIT and many others, say that AWG is not settled science. The Prime Minister's comments sound like Pope Urban VII to Galileo.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
